tool_description:
Wavecell SMS API allows registered users to send SMS worldwide using a simple , fast and reliable  HTTP API.

Send messages in minutes - Get your free trial at : http://www.wavecell.com
name: Wavecell SMS
title: Wavecell SMS

api_list.name: SMS-MT - Send SMS (GET)
api_list.description: Send a SMS message using Wavecell HTTP GET

required_parameters.name: encoding
required_parameters.description: The encoding format of the message

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: The destination phone number (MSISDN) to send to. This must be in international format without "+" such as 33123456789. 33 is the country code and 123456789 is the mobile number

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: This is the sender Id the message will appear from, TPOA. Only available on agreed routes with your account manager.

required_parameters.name: scheduleddatetime
required_parameters.description: Specify this if you wish to schedule your message up to 7 days in advance, to be specified in UTC Time. Specify this parameter blank if you do not want to schedule your message. SET 0 IF NOT REQUIRED

api_list.name: Get delivery status
api_list.description: This API should be used to retrieve the current delivery status of a message sent using Wavecell.

required_parameters.name: umid
required_parameters.description: The Unique Message ID of the SMS for which you want to retrieve the delivery status
